title: Morphed Photo Shared To Claim Chandrababu Naidu Has Joined YSRCP
subtitle: The edited photo shows Chandrababu Naidu posing with YSRCP president Jagan Mohan Reddy
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Photo showing Andhra Pradesh chief Minister and Telugu Desam Party chief, Chandrababu Naidu with Jagan Mohan Reddy, president of YSR Congress Party (YSRCP). The caption claims that Naidu has joined Reddy's political camp.

Chandrababu Naidu's face has been edited into the photo to show him and Jagan Mohan Reddy together. The original photo shows Jagan Mohan Reddy posing with Magunta Srinivasulu Reddy, a former member of the Telugu Desam Party who joined YSRCP ahead of the 2019 Lok Sabha elections. A case was also registered against film director Ram Gopal Varma for sharing the morphed photo on his social media accounts.
